channel.title: Careers on Letters From Iman
channel.description: Recent content in Careers on Letters From Iman

item.title: The Daily Life of a Software Engineer in Jakarta
item.description: In this article, I will share what my typical daily looks like as Software Engineer in Jakarta.

item.title: Programming as a Passion vs Programming as a Job
item.description: When we were still in college, we always demanded for studying hard. Having a good score in every class and also active in social community, club or something.

item.title: An Opinion-based : Advices to Junior Programmer
item.description: Being junior is a bit scary. It’s like too many things that we must know and learn. The system, the teams, the new technology, and everything. Currently, I can said, I’m a junior in my office. But time by the time, my task increased and more deep. At the beginning I just instructed to code something, then report to my team lead. Now, I’m beginning to solve a problem then report to the whole team. It means, I’ve survived in Junior life.
